name: dockstarter
tagline: A setup tool for configuring Docker-based apps on home servers
description: DockSTARTer helps users get started with home server apps by automating the configuration of Docker containers using templates. It supports media servers, automation tools, and is ideal for beginner self-hosters.

features.title: Automated Setup
features.description: Configure home server apps automatically. Beginner-friendly deployment

features.title: Template Library
features.description: Pre-configured containers for popular apps. Quick stack building

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Perfect for Plex, Sonarr, Radarr, and more. Complete media stack

features.title: Guided Configuration
features.description: Step-by-step setup process. Easy for newcomers

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Build your home server with confidence. Simplified self-hosting
